chapters.title: Chapter 17: Deceptions
chapters.info: Guaire Amalasan, p. 291 (256)—False Dragon of centuries past, from Free Years 939–943. He started the War of the Second Dragon, during which a young king named Artur Paendrag Tanreall rose to overwhelming prominence and power. Siuan Sanche recommends gentling Mazrim Taim to avoid another episode like that when Amalasan was being gentled. See also Dragon Reborn; Paendrag Tanreall, Artur.
